about_the_game:
Peace has been restored to the fantasy world of Alorea following The Gormas War, a bloody conflict which left the population weary and withered. You are The Professor, a scientist and researcher who, at the behest of The Academy, have set out on a journey to find an answer to Alorea’s population crisis.   

A new and indie VN dev team presents: Flora & Fauna! 

Featuring high-level illustrations, music, and a story-driven narrative, Flora & Fauna is an adult visual novel where you set out on a journey to collect “samples” from a variety of fantasy ladies. This game also includes both M|W and W|W intimacy options.

Each character will be introduced periodically through her very own chapter that lets The Professor discover more about her people and way of life. How you decide to treat each girl will determine how your intimacy will play out!

  • Chapter 1: Human (June 2024 Release)
  • Chapter 2: Elf (TBD)
  • Chapter 3: Orc (TBD) 
  • Chapter 4: Unicorn (TBD)
  • Chapter 5: Dryad (TBD)

Discover the magical maidens of Flora & Fauna and find out if the women of Alorea will give their bodies to science!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains full nudity, sexual language, positive depictions of sex work, allusions to substance use, and illustrated depictions of consensual sex.
